item.title: What Is Continuous Integration?
item.description: Continuous Integration (CI) is a term you might have heard sometimes, but wonder what it is and how you can use it to automate your workflow. CI is a process of automating code workflows, such as build, and testing. Why & What? CI is popular for almost any project regardless the size of it. Instead of building or testing your code manually. It can be triggerd on commits to specific branch in your version control.

item.title: What is the cloud? Is it the right thing for you?
item.description: The cloud can be many things, and it’s a big subject. Cloud is often called “someone else’s computer”, which it is to some extent. But today we will discuss the subject cloud a bit and give you a brother understanding of what it is and what the pros and cons are. What is the cloud? You might think that the cloud is just one server that someone owns, which isn’t true.
